Fitness Desk: Introduce deskee thateez can use to stand and work at the same time.
Office Yoga Classes: Schedule regular yoga classes in the office to help employees stretch and de-stress.
Wellness Challenge: Organize a wellness challenge where employees can compete to see who can make the most progress in their fitness journey.
Walking Meetings: Encourage employees to take walking meetings instead of sitting at their desks.
Fitness Vending Machines: Install fitness vending machines in the office that offer healthy snacks and drinks, as well as resistance bands and other fitness equipment.
